The reason for this answer is that while Nicolas Roeg directed one of the segments in the anthology film Aria (1987), as stated in document 151.txt, it is not explicitly mentioned that he was the sole director of the entire film. In fact, document 151.txt states that he "directed one of the segments", implying that there were other directors involved in the project.

llama3.1.reason: The claim is wrong because Aria (1987) was an anthology film where Nicolas Roeg contributed a short, but he did not direct the entire film.
